screenshot.caption: SR2 file open in Adobe Lightroom 5

description: The SR2 format is an extension of the Sony RAW ( .SRF ) format. In addition, Sony also develops the Alpha Raw ( .ARW ) image format utilized by select Sony digital cameras, such as the a7R III and a6300 models.
SR2 is one of many RAW image formats utilized by various camera manufacturers. Other formats include:
